title: Samsung Galaxy A32 5G and Galaxy A71 4G receive Android 12 with One UI 4.1 update
content:
Samsung has set a new benchmark for what software updates can mean for Android devices. From the top-of-the-line flagships to budget-friendly offerings, the Korean OEM has been spreading the One UI 4.1 love across all segments. Earlier this week, we saw the One UI 4.1 rollout going live for the Galaxy M31. Now, two more

The post Samsung Galaxy A32 5G and Galaxy A71 4G receive Android 12 with One UI 4.1 update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has begun rolling out the One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy A32 5G and Galaxy A71 4G on top of Android 12. Read on to know more!
